packet-beta

0-3: "Version (Infra_RedisCache)"
4-11: "Traffic Class (Infra_WorkerNode)"
12-31: "Flow Label (Infra_WorkerNode)"
32-47: "Payload Length (Infra_WorkerNode)"
48-55: "Next Header (Infra_IngressController)"
56-63: "Hop Limit (Infra_EtcdCluster)"
64-127: "Source Address (Infra_WorkerNode)"
128-191: "Source Address (Infra_LoadBalancer)"
192-255: "Destination Address (Infra_RedisCache)"
256-319: "Destination Address (Infra_IngressController)"
